events.message: The policyholder reported a car collision incident that occurred on the morning of February 28, requesting immediate claim initiation.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after confirming that the vehicle was involved in a traffic collision with another car.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to manage the case and to ensure the claimant receives timely updates throughout the process.
The claimant was sent an acknowledgment of the claim receipt along with the expected next steps and preliminary timelines.
Requested the claimant to provide photos of the damaged vehicle, police accident report, and proof of car registration to proceed.
The claimant submitted all requested documents including detailed photos of the collision damage and the official police report.
An investigation team began reviewing the submitted evidence and contacted witnesses to verify the circumstances of the accident.
Investigation successfully concluded confirming liability and validating the claimant's account of the vehicle collision event.
A settlement amount covering the full estimated repairs was proposed to the claimant based on the damage assessment and policy terms.
The claimant provided positive feedback regarding the clarity and fairness of the proposed settlement and the communication process.
The claim was officially approved for payout following agreement on the settlement amount between the insurer and the claimant.
The approved settlement payment was issued promptly to the claimantâ€™s bank account to cover repair costs for the vehicle.
The claim case was officially closed after confirming receipt of payment and satisfaction expressed by the claimant.
All claim-related records and correspondence were archived securely for future reference and audit purposes.
